message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it would be a valuable asset to you. I'm asking for $15,000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,000. I believe it's a bit pricey at $15,000.
Bob, I understand your position, but $8,000 is significantly below its true value. I'm willing to come down to $12,000. This is my final offer.

I appreciate your flexibility, but $12,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal.
